subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Nascar fined Brad Keselowski $50,000 and Tony Stewart $25,000 and placed both drivers on probation. Matt Kenseth and Denny Hamlin were not penalized for their roles.
snippet: Nascar fined Brad Keselowski $50,000 and Tony Stewart $25,000 and placed both drivers on probation. Matt Kenseth and Denny Hamlin were not penalized for their roles.
